title: Kayn doing More Damage in RedForm than BlueForm
body:
Level 18 my higest bonus magic  dmg was 90, is this a bug or intentional?{{champion:141}} 
also it seems that a dmg build is better over all, since both farms ultilize abiity dmg vs raw basic attacks

replies.body: Since this is the first week of his release Kayn is still being monitored and could possibly be tweaked. Make sure to hit up the [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards to open up this discussion a little more and get more feedback from others who have been playing him extensively!
I did and got -9 downvotes lol
